param.description:
The property within the params of the corresponding moduleCommand type transaction for which the corresponding schema is to be used to serialize the information.
Example: The schema with `"$id": "/auth/command/regMultisigMsg"` is to be used to serialize the `signatures` data within the transaction params for the `auth:registerMultisignature` command.

$id.description: Unique identifier of the message schema.
